ray.rage.asset.texture.loaders

Class RgbaTextureLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.asset.texture.loaders.RgbaTextureLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssetLoader<Texture>, TextureLoader, Disposable

    public final class RgbaTextureLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextureLoader
    A texture-loader capable of processing raw image data stored using the RGB color-space.

    Some common file extensions generally include the following:

    • .jpg
    • .jpeg
    • .png
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

      • loadAsset

        public void loadAsset(Texture tex,
                      java.nio.file.Path path)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.NullPointerException
        Description copied from interface: AssetLoader
        Reads the data from the specified path on disk, extracts the necessary information, and assigns it to the specified asset.
        Specified by:
        loadAsset in interface AssetLoader<Texture>
        Parameters:
        tex - The asset instance to be initialized.
        path - The file system path where the asset's data will be loaded from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the data cannot be read from the file system.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the asset is null

      • notifyDispose

        public void notifyDispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Explicitly releases the internal resources held by this instance, making it unusable afterwards.

        WARNING: This method is meant to be used internally by the framework and not by game clients. Use directly only if you really know what you're doing.

        Specified by:
        notifyDispose in interface Disposable
